title: Hope Is On The Way: How God Reveals a Wellspring of Help on Easter Saturday
description: Do you feel overwhelmed by pain? Has your heart been shattered? Afraid you may never recover? Can’t pray?Then you need a balm for your heartache and a road map to a better place. But most of all, you need a renewed hope in the possibilities and reconnection with the source of all hope, God.Dr. Pam Ellinger-Dixon will coach you on how to:choose your response to suffering,put your shattered pieces back together in a novel way,see Jesus fighting for you,persevere through the hardest days,tap into the hope of God’s ability to transform anything, anddare to believe in profound restoration. God weeps with you and is present in the darkest of dark places of heartache. He cares for you whether you feel it or not. Don’t give up now. Hope is on the way!Dr. Pam Ellinger-Dixon has led hundreds of people through their darkest valleys, helping them create a new life. Dr. Pam offers counsel from thirty-plus years of walking alongside those who dared to seek help in the worst of circumstances, from natural disasters to accidents to the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Serving as board chairperson of a trauma recovery center and running a practice in Columbus, Dr. Pam sheds new light on the path to recovery.
author: Pam Ellinger-Dixon
